00028 #ifndef LUSTRE_ERRNO_H
00029 #define LUSTRE_ERRNO_H
00030 
00031 /*
00032  * Only "network" errnos, which are defined below, are allowed on wire (or on
00033  * disk).  Generic routines exist to help translate between these and a subset
00034  * of the "host" errnos.  Some host errnos (e.g., EDEADLOCK) are intentionally
00035  * left out.  See also the comment on lustre_errno_hton_mapping[].
00036  *
00037  * To maintain compatibility with existing x86 clients and servers, each of
00038  * these network errnos has the same numerical value as its corresponding host
00039  * errno on x86.
00040  */
00041 #define LUSTRE_EPERM            1       /* Operation not permitted */
00042 #define LUSTRE_ENOENT           2       /* No such file or directory */
00043 #define LUSTRE_ESRCH            3       /* No such process */
00044 #define LUSTRE_EINTR            4       /* Interrupted system call */
00045 #define LUSTRE_EIO              5       /* I/O error */
00046 #define LUSTRE_ENXIO            6       /* No such device or address */
00047 #define LUSTRE_E2BIG            7       /* Argument list too long */
00048 #define LUSTRE_ENOEXEC          8       /* Exec format error */
00049 #define LUSTRE_EBADF            9       /* Bad file number */
00050 #define LUSTRE_ECHILD           10      /* No child processes */
00051 #define LUSTRE_EAGAIN           11      /* Try again */
00052 #define LUSTRE_ENOMEM           12      /* Out of memory */
00053 #define LUSTRE_EACCES           13      /* Permission denied */
00054 #define LUSTRE_EFAULT           14      /* Bad address */
00055 #define LUSTRE_ENOTBLK          15      /* Block device required */
00056 #define LUSTRE_EBUSY            16      /* Device or resource busy */
00057 #define LUSTRE_EEXIST           17      /* File exists */
00058 #define LUSTRE_EXDEV            18      /* Cross-device link */
00059 #define LUSTRE_ENODEV           19      /* No such device */
00060 #define LUSTRE_ENOTDIR          20      /* Not a directory */
00061 #define LUSTRE_EISDIR           21      /* Is a directory */
00062 #define LUSTRE_EINVAL           22      /* Invalid argument */
00063 #define LUSTRE_ENFILE           23      /* File table overflow */
00064 #define LUSTRE_EMFILE           24      /* Too many open files */
00065 #define LUSTRE_ENOTTY           25      /* Not a typewriter */
00066 #define LUSTRE_ETXTBSY          26      /* Text file busy */
00067 #define LUSTRE_EFBIG            27      /* File too large */
00068 #define LUSTRE_ENOSPC           28      /* No space left on device */
00069 #define LUSTRE_ESPIPE           29      /* Illegal seek */
00070 #define LUSTRE_EROFS            30      /* Read-only file system */
00071 #define LUSTRE_EMLINK           31      /* Too many links */
00072 #define LUSTRE_EPIPE            32      /* Broken pipe */
00073 #define LUSTRE_EDOM             33      /* Math argument out of domain of
00074                                            func */
00075 #define LUSTRE_ERANGE           34      /* Math result not representable */
00076 #define LUSTRE_EDEADLK          35      /* Resource deadlock would occur */
00077 #define LUSTRE_ENAMETOOLONG     36      /* File name too long */
00078 #define LUSTRE_ENOLCK           37      /* No record locks available */
00079 #define LUSTRE_ENOSYS           38      /* Function not implemented */
00080 #define LUSTRE_ENOTEMPTY        39      /* Directory not empty */
00081 #define LUSTRE_ELOOP            40      /* Too many symbolic links
00082                                            encountered */
00083 #define LUSTRE_ENOMSG           42      /* No message of desired type */
00084 #define LUSTRE_EIDRM            43      /* Identifier removed */
00085 #define LUSTRE_ECHRNG           44      /* Channel number out of range */
00086 #define LUSTRE_EL2NSYNC         45      /* Level 2 not synchronized */
00087 #define LUSTRE_EL3HLT           46      /* Level 3 halted */
00088 #define LUSTRE_EL3RST           47      /* Level 3 reset */
00089 #define LUSTRE_ELNRNG           48      /* Link number out of range */
00090 #define LUSTRE_EUNATCH          49      /* Protocol driver not attached */
00091 #define LUSTRE_ENOCSI           50      /* No CSI structure available */
00092 #define LUSTRE_EL2HLT           51      /* Level 2 halted */
00093 #define LUSTRE_EBADE            52      /* Invalid exchange */
00094 #define LUSTRE_EBADR            53      /* Invalid request descriptor */
00095 #define LUSTRE_EXFULL           54      /* Exchange full */
00096 #define LUSTRE_ENOANO           55      /* No anode */
00097 #define LUSTRE_EBADRQC          56      /* Invalid request code */
00098 #define LUSTRE_EBADSLT          57      /* Invalid slot */
00099 #define LUSTRE_EBFONT           59      /* Bad font file format */
00100 #define LUSTRE_ENOSTR           60      /* Device not a stream */
00101 #define LUSTRE_ENODATA          61      /* No data available */
00102 #define LUSTRE_ETIME            62      /* Timer expired */
00103 #define LUSTRE_ENOSR            63      /* Out of streams resources */
00104 #define LUSTRE_ENONET           64      /* Machine is not on the network */
00105 #define LUSTRE_ENOPKG           65      /* Package not installed */
00106 #define LUSTRE_EREMOTE          66      /* Object is remote */
00107 #define LUSTRE_ENOLINK          67      /* Link has been severed */
00108 #define LUSTRE_EADV             68      /* Advertise error */
00109 #define LUSTRE_ESRMNT           69      /* Srmount error */
00110 #define LUSTRE_ECOMM            70      /* Communication error on send */
00111 #define LUSTRE_EPROTO           71      /* Protocol error */
00112 #define LUSTRE_EMULTIHOP        72      /* Multihop attempted */
00113 #define LUSTRE_EDOTDOT          73      /* RFS specific error */
00114 #define LUSTRE_EBADMSG          74      /* Not a data message */
00115 #define LUSTRE_EOVERFLOW        75      /* Value too large for defined data
00116                                            type */
00117 #define LUSTRE_ENOTUNIQ         76      /* Name not unique on network */
00118 #define LUSTRE_EBADFD           77      /* File descriptor in bad state */
00119 #define LUSTRE_EREMCHG          78      /* Remote address changed */
00120 #define LUSTRE_ELIBACC          79      /* Can not access a needed shared
00121                                            library */
00122 #define LUSTRE_ELIBBAD          80      /* Accessing a corrupted shared
00123                                            library */
00124 #define LUSTRE_ELIBSCN          81      /* .lib section in a.out corrupted */
00125 #define LUSTRE_ELIBMAX          82      /* Attempting to link in too many shared
00126                                            libraries */
00127 #define LUSTRE_ELIBEXEC         83      /* Cannot exec a shared library
00128                                            directly */
00129 #define LUSTRE_EILSEQ           84      /* Illegal byte sequence */
00130 #define LUSTRE_ERESTART         85      /* Interrupted system call should be
00131                                            restarted */
00132 #define LUSTRE_ESTRPIPE         86      /* Streams pipe error */
00133 #define LUSTRE_EUSERS           87      /* Too many users */
00134 #define LUSTRE_ENOTSOCK         88      /* Socket operation on non-socket */
00135 #define LUSTRE_EDESTADDRREQ     89      /* Destination address required */
00136 #define LUSTRE_EMSGSIZE         90      /* Message too long */
00137 #define LUSTRE_EPROTOTYPE       91      /* Protocol wrong type for socket */
00138 #define LUSTRE_ENOPROTOOPT      92      /* Protocol not available */
00139 #define LUSTRE_EPROTONOSUPPORT  93      /* Protocol not supported */
00140 #define LUSTRE_ESOCKTNOSUPPORT  94      /* Socket type not supported */
00141 #define LUSTRE_EOPNOTSUPP       95      /* Operation not supported on transport
00142                                            endpoint */
00143 #define LUSTRE_EPFNOSUPPORT     96      /* Protocol family not supported */
00144 #define LUSTRE_EAFNOSUPPORT     97      /* Address family not supported by
00145                                            protocol */
00146 #define LUSTRE_EADDRINUSE       98      /* Address already in use */
00147 #define LUSTRE_EADDRNOTAVAIL    99      /* Cannot assign requested address */
00148 #define LUSTRE_ENETDOWN         100     /* Network is down */
00149 #define LUSTRE_ENETUNREACH      101     /* Network is unreachable */
00150 #define LUSTRE_ENETRESET        102     /* Network dropped connection because of
00151                                            reset */
00152 #define LUSTRE_ECONNABORTED     103     /* Software caused connection abort */
00153 #define LUSTRE_ECONNRESET       104     /* Connection reset by peer */
00154 #define LUSTRE_ENOBUFS          105     /* No buffer space available */
00155 #define LUSTRE_EISCONN          106     /* Transport endpoint is already
00156                                            connected */
00157 #define LUSTRE_ENOTCONN         107     /* Transport endpoint is not
00158                                            connected */
00159 #define LUSTRE_ESHUTDOWN        108     /* Cannot send after transport endpoint
00160                                            shutdown */
00161 #define LUSTRE_ETOOMANYREFS     109     /* Too many references: cannot splice */
00162 #define LUSTRE_ETIMEDOUT        110     /* Connection timed out */
00163 #define LUSTRE_ECONNREFUSED     111     /* Connection refused */
00164 #define LUSTRE_EHOSTDOWN        112     /* Host is down */
00165 #define LUSTRE_EHOSTUNREACH     113     /* No route to host */
00166 #define LUSTRE_EALREADY         114     /* Operation already in progress */
00167 #define LUSTRE_EINPROGRESS      115     /* Operation now in progress */
00168 #define LUSTRE_ESTALE           116     /* Stale NFS file handle */
00169 #define LUSTRE_EUCLEAN          117     /* Structure needs cleaning */
00170 #define LUSTRE_ENOTNAM          118     /* Not a XENIX named type file */
00171 #define LUSTRE_ENAVAIL          119     /* No XENIX semaphores available */
00172 #define LUSTRE_EISNAM           120     /* Is a named type file */
00173 #define LUSTRE_EREMOTEIO        121     /* Remote I/O error */
00174 #define LUSTRE_EDQUOT           122     /* Quota exceeded */
00175 #define LUSTRE_ENOMEDIUM        123     /* No medium found */
00176 #define LUSTRE_EMEDIUMTYPE      124     /* Wrong medium type */
00177 #define LUSTRE_ECANCELED        125     /* Operation Canceled */
00178 #define LUSTRE_ENOKEY           126     /* Required key not available */
00179 #define LUSTRE_EKEYEXPIRED      127     /* Key has expired */
00180 #define LUSTRE_EKEYREVOKED      128     /* Key has been revoked */
00181 #define LUSTRE_EKEYREJECTED     129     /* Key was rejected by service */
00182 #define LUSTRE_EOWNERDEAD       130     /* Owner died */
00183 #define LUSTRE_ENOTRECOVERABLE  131     /* State not recoverable */
00184 #define LUSTRE_ERESTARTSYS      512
00185 #define LUSTRE_ERESTARTNOINTR   513
00186 #define LUSTRE_ERESTARTNOHAND   514     /* restart if no handler.. */
00187 #define LUSTRE_ENOIOCTLCMD      515     /* No ioctl command */
00188 #define LUSTRE_ERESTART_RESTARTBLOCK 516 /* restart by calling
00189                                             sys_restart_syscall */
00190 #define LUSTRE_EBADHANDLE       521     /* Illegal NFS file handle */
00191 #define LUSTRE_ENOTSYNC         522     /* Update synchronization mismatch */
00192 #define LUSTRE_EBADCOOKIE       523     /* Cookie is stale */
00193 #define LUSTRE_ENOTSUPP         524     /* Operation is not supported */
00194 #define LUSTRE_ETOOSMALL        525     /* Buffer or request is too small */
00195 #define LUSTRE_ESERVERFAULT     526     /* An untranslatable error occurred */
00196 #define LUSTRE_EBADTYPE         527     /* Type not supported by server */
00197 #define LUSTRE_EJUKEBOX         528     /* Request initiated, but will not
00198                                            complete before timeout */
00199 #define LUSTRE_EIOCBQUEUED      529     /* iocb queued, will get completion
00200                                            event */
00201 
00202 /*
00203  * Translations are optimized away on x86.  Host errnos that shouldn't be put
00204  * on wire could leak through as a result.  Do not count on this side effect.
00205  */
00206 #if !defined(__x86_64__) && !defined(__i386__)
00207 #define LUSTRE_TRANSLATE_ERRNOS
00208 #endif
00209 
00210 #ifdef LUSTRE_TRANSLATE_ERRNOS
00211 unsigned int lustre_errno_hton(unsigned int h);
00212 unsigned int lustre_errno_ntoh(unsigned int n);
00213 #else
00214 #define lustre_errno_hton(h) (h)
00215 #define lustre_errno_ntoh(n) (n)
00216 #endif
00217 
00218 #endif /* LUSTRE_ERRNO_H */
